1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the San d'Orian Provincial Knights.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Bastokan Legion.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Federation of Windurst.
1�Greetings. I am 	, Campaign Arbiter for the Allied Forces.
1�What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.
1�You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.

1�Understood. I shall prepare a new set of tags for you now.
1�Let me show you the list of items currently available to you.

1�Complete transaction and return to capital?Yes.No.
1�What would you like to know?Nothing. I'm sorry.About performance assessment.About Allied Tags.About temporary items.About Unions.
1�Anyone wearing Allied Tags while participating in a campaign battle will be judged on their overall performance.
1�Soldiers will be evaluated not only on their fighting skills, but also on how much they contribute to the efforts of their allies through means such as healing and enhancing.
1�However, beware that if you leave the area before being assessed, you will be deemed a deserter and will forfeit all rewards earned that day.
1�Also, while there are no immediate penalties for being knocked out, falling in battle will significantly lower the score given to you.
1�When you are ready to receive compensation for your work on the field, return to me and I shall assess your performance and provide you with your payment.
1�That is all.
1�Allied Tags are a special type of identification given to all participants of Allied Campaign battles.
1�There are benefits, as well as drawbacks, to wearing the tags. One of the benefits is that in the case you are knocked out on the battlefield, you will not lose any experience points.
1�However, some of the drawbacks include the inability to improve skills and earn experience points for individual kills, as well as the right to loot fallen enemies.
1�That is all.
1�Temporary items can be purchased in exchange for Allied Notes.
1�There are several different varieties of items, but they all have one thing in common--they can only be used on the battlefield they were issued.
1�It is highly recommended that you first survey a battle's conditions and then select the supplies that you believe will benefit you most.
1�Please remember that all temporary items you carry on your person will be confiscated in the event that you leave the area.
1�That is all.
1�Oh ho! Keen to join a Union, are we?Very well. Listen up and I shall tell you all you need to know.

1�In order to better coordinate Allied efforts against the beastman menace, we have instituted a system of ad hoc tactical regiments called ??Unions.?? With five units to a battlefield, union registration is open to any proven soldier in possession of Allied Tags.
1�In return for their aid in advancing the war effort, union registrants will be eligible to earn a share of the spoils of war.

1�Needless to say, the choicest rewards will be reserved for those unions which make the greatest contributions in combat.Prove your mettle on the field of battle, and you will earn glory for your union, as well as a sizable bounty of your own.

1�Be forewarned that your commitment to your union comes first and foremost.In the aftermath of battle, you will not be permitted to reap rewards from your individual exploits until your union has distributed its plunder.
1�That is all.
1�Light the torch?Yes.No.
1�Light the torch?Yes.No.
1�Light the torch?Yes.No.
1�Light the torch?Yes.No.
1�What's going on here!?Ghyo of the Tigresses and Romaa of the Cobras...Who's guarding Fort Karugo-Narugo!?
1�Keep your explanation brief!
1�You're certain?
1�I'm surprised this type of equipment appeared so early...
1�Was there anything else gleaned from the quipus?
1�??Manifest, lead us to the city.Windurst...will fall??...?
1�Fascinating.So the Yagudo leader has joined the main thrust towards the city.That explains why the castle is so empty...
1�No, I think I understand the game now.First, we return to Karugo-Narugo.
1�Romaa, I need you to head to Windurst after all.Rouse the Anacondas and send them to the fort with all haste!
1�Is that it for this floor?
1�Where are all the hulkin' elite troops hidin'?We've fought nothin' but rrrank and file...
1�That puffed-up peabrrrain from the Sagittarian War Warlocks sent us here under the Star Sibyl's name.We thought we had no choice!
1�Manifest?What's that supposed to mean?
1�Looks like it.No sign of strrragglers...
1�Huh?Romaa, what are you and   doin' here?
1�That's rrright.And there was this--
1�We left prrretty much nothing but the little warlock guys at the fort.I'm guessin' they aren't too handy with swords or bows...
1�Isn't that what they call the Yagudo deity...?
1�Ghyo!We need you back at the fort!
1�The fort is in big trrrouble!
1�Here's the situation...
1�Tzee Xicu the Manifest!
1�When you're done hypothesizin', how about we mobilize our forces and march back to Windurst!?
1�Understood.I'll pass on the order to Perih.
1� , return to Karugo-Narugo with Ghyo and the others.They're gonna need all the help they can get!
1�One of the prisoners!Are you all right!?
1�You can rrrest easy, friend. You'll be safe now.And don't you worry; we'll see to your companions.
1�Can you hear us, frrriend?We've come to rescue you!
1�Our regiment has made camp in the Meriphataud Mountains. You will be safe there.Can you make the trip alone?
1�You there! Can you stand?
1�Yeah, yeah. Are we done here alrrready?Here's  $???? and  $????. Just try not to get yourself killed on the way out, okay?
1�Is that everyone?
1�Syu is up there, you say!?
1�Grrrrr... Don't you worry.We'll see to yer friends, and I'll personally ensure that the crows pay for their vile deeds.
1�That noise...it came from above!
1�And what of our companions, Lehko? There are wounded among them.Someone must escorrrt them to safety. To the capital--
1�Jeuno?
1�Yes, we must take proper prrrecautions this time.I believe I can spare a couple o' my girls as backup.
1�Lehko. I'll escort them back to camp for the meantime.They'll be needing a good meal and rest before they depart.
1�Hm? What's this now...?
1�A key? And yet, different from our #????...Could one of the birdmen have drrropped it?
1�Well, Lehko, Perih,  ... Looks like you're in business.Now go teach those birdmen a lesson they won't soon forrrget.
1�Should anything happen to that key, come and see me back in Meriphataud.I'll have our quartermaster whip up a spare.
1�The Star Sibyl...?
1�Kyah-kyah. What brings you to our nest, smoothskin?
1�You seek 3????, you say? Kyah-hah-hah!
1�Squawk! A fool you are.Fool-fool-fool. You would trespass so deep into our holy ground in search of some trinket from an old hen's tale?
1�Kyah!You will die like the infidel you are!
1�Kakwah?My lord?
1�Lower your weapon.
1�Have you forgotten the pact!?Kyah! Your insolence knows no bounds!
1�Are we Yagudo not the most proud and honorable of the races?Pray that I do not inform Tzee Xicu of your affront!
1�Yes, I know the relic of which you speak, entrusted to us by our ??friends?? of old.It is an ancient, ancient tale, written off by all as pure fable.
1�All save for I...for I am Kaa Toru the Just.
1�I give fair hearing to all who come before me, even a smoothskin such as you.
1�But in exchange for my fair judgment, my demands are stern.
1�Bring proof that you are truly the promised one, and your cause shall be heard.
1�But be forewarned.If your heart is deemed deceitful, my brethren will pick the flesh from your bones.Kyah!
1�I give fair hearing to all who come before me, even a smoothskin such as you.
1�Bring proof that you are truly the promised one, and your cause shall be heard.
1�But be forewarned.If your heart is deemed deceitful, my brethren will pick the flesh from your bones.Kyah!
1�I see.
1�I deem you worthy.You are indeed ?[he/she] of whom the legends spoke.
1�Take it.It is yours.
1�Do not fool yourself into thinking that anything has changed.You and your kind remain our bitter enemy. So were you yesterday, and so shall you be tomorrow.
1�I performed my duty.That is all.
1�Now begone from our holy ground at once.You will find no more favors here.Kyah-kyah!
1�Assist with the fortifications?Show them how it's done!Refuse to help.Ask for an explanation.
1�Choose a crystal!Fire crystal.Ice crystal.Wind crystal.Earth crystal.Lightning crystal.Water crystal.Light crystal.Dark crystal.Plumb give up.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.A Manifest Problem.The Forbidden Path(pt.1).The Forbidden Path(pt.2).The Forbidden Path(pt.3).Manifest Destiny(pt.1).Manifest Destiny(pt.2).Manifest Destiny(pt.3).Manifest Destiny(pt.4).Manifest Destiny(pt.5).Manifest Destiny(pt.6).At Journey's End(pt.1).At Journey's End(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�Press the button to continue.
1�Trrread carefully here.Their ranks may be thinned, but the crows will be no less fierce in defending their nest.
1�Drawing any attention to ourselves could prove fatal.Move silently, and avoid unnecessary confrontations at all costs.
1�<Ahem>...Ease your gentle hearts, fair damsels, for I have come to rescue you!
1�Milady. The knowledge that you will live to grace this realm with your consummate beauty is reward enough for this humble squire.
1�Only one floor to go.Phew... Being a hero sure isn't easy.
1�It would seem our hosts have decided to roll out the red carpet for us.Whoever said the Yagudo weren't much for hospitality?
1�...You have permission to bring down Tzee Xicu the Manifest and the Great Beast, Fenrir.
1�It simply wouldn't do to keep our hosts waiting any longer.Shall we, friends?
1�Perih,  ! Be on your guarrrd!
1�Doubtless the magical energies of our two brrrave companions--no, their very life forces--are on the wane...
1�What is it,  ?
1�Where we go from here, the slightest hint of indecision could easily prove fatal.If something troubles you, speak it here and now.
1�Very well,  .I had no intention of keeping my secrets from you forever.
1�My weapon of choice is not the sword or bow, but rrrather my wit and tongue.This much you know.

1�This war, tragic as it has been for the people of this land, has afforded me a chance to achieve certain goals.Goals in pursuit of which I have told many a lie, committed many a heinous deed...rrrarely with even a second thought.
1�And yet, even as I schemed in the dark, there have been rays of light.The people of Windurst, Robel-Akbel...and you most of all,  .
1�Thanks to friends such as you, the sun shines brrrighter today than it did yesterday.And tomorrow will welcome an even more brilliant dawn.
1�You've meant more to me than you can possibly imagine,  .You, and this nation of Windurst...
1�That, at the very least, is the honest truth--
!�...It would seem our beastly friend has returned.
1� . The time has come for us to make good on our prrromise.
1�It's time we brought this idle palaver to a close.We must track down 6???? and make for the beast's den straight away!

1�It was almost too easy.The Warlock Warlord came to me, his trusted advisor, seeking a means to bolster our army.It was then that I presented the idea of rrrecruiting mercenaries from the Motherland in great numbers.
1�There were skeptics, of course.Those who said we were incurring a debt to the Motherland that we'd not be able to repay...
1�Look into these eyes, Perih.Can you see the mark of sin on my soul?
1�That my soul in its rage would live on, until the day came that I could exact revenge on every last one of those who had wronged me and my kin...
1�A most fortuitous meeting of minds, wouldn't you say?
1�Say your worst.I've no regrets about what I've done.
1�You should leave this place while you can.
1�The Theomilitary, or what's left of it, is hot on our trrrail.It won't be safe here.
1�And do try not to miss, won't you?
..�...It won't take these zealots long to catch wind of our little deicide.
d!�My poor Shikaree G... You've no idea how utter and complete your humiliation will be.
1�The Bow of Light is mine now. And with it, control over the future... Your future.
1�A new era will dawn, forged by the hand of a sinner, and you'll live out the rest of your days in it.
1�Hah! Save me?You'd risk your life for a trrraitor?
1�You ladies are just full of surrrprises, aren't you?It's too much for a simple man like me...
1�The castle is vast. To search it as a unit would require time we do not have.I say we split up.
1�Are you safe, frrriends?
1�You need fear no longer.Make for our camp in Meriphataud. There is food and medicine for you there.
1�There's only one beast that could let forth such an unearthly howl.
1�No. They were bound for Jeuno.
1�Yes. To stay concealed from our enemy and other unfriendly eyes, the Duchy is the safest destination.
1�My own daughter has taken refuge there as well.I can lead them if need be.
1�Syu... We must find Syu!
1�The beast fights to protect us, as it did on the Sarutabaruta plain.And yet, its aura has grown faint...
1�Syu!?Syu Befrathi!
1�But...why, Lehko?
1�...I cannot.
1�That which you seek is not in my power to grant.Even if it were, still I would refuse.
1�I have looked deep into your eyes, Lehko, but I see no sin there.Only deep scars that have never healed...
1�I see also darkness. But this darkness is not yours alone.No, it runs far deeper... It is the darkness of our entire people.
1�Do you not see, Shikaree G? We all bear the stain of sin.You, me...and every Mithra with spite and jealousy in her heart.
1�After all we've been through together... You sell your ladies far too short, Lehko.
1�We'll see you saved, and Syu and our Motherland as well.Just you watch.
1�Not a traitor...a friend.

1�Many times we have stood on the precipice of death, and each time you have led us safely through.You have inspired us with hope in our darkest hours. You may have told many lies, Lehko, but the love you bear for your friends and comrades rings true.
1�Besides...something tells me that the future you and Robel-Akbel have in store will be one worth sticking arrround to see.
1�I will not hide from you, Shikaree G.When all is said and done, should you still deem my actions unpardonable, I shall submit myself willingly to your justice.
1�Meooow...
1�Meowmmy?Wh...where's my meowmm
1�Waaaaaahhh!!!I want my meowmmy!
s!�Wheeeeee!Are we going for a rrride?
1�Where is the daughter?One way or the other, she will be mine. Don't make this any harrrder than it needs to be.
1�And you, Perih Vashai.You would knowingly aid a sinner, and open the wounds of our past anew?
1�Spare me the hollow words, Lehko!Your mother spouted the same platitudes as she brought unspeakable bloodshed upon our people.
1�Your battle, the fate of this land--these mean nothing to me.Do you hear me? You will die by my hand before you bend that bow.
1�Do you think I am blind to your secrets, Lehko?The grrrudge you bear toward your own people is as plain as day.
1�Oh, yes. I know who you truly are, Lehko Habhoka.The honey-tongued turncoat who sold out his country to a foreign realm!
1�You two-timing blackguard--!
1�Not if you die here, cur!
1�Surrender the bow, Perih Vashai!
1�You know where your loyalities lie!Surrender the bow, the traitor, and the daughter to me. I will see Mithran justice serrrved!
1�Rrridiculous--!
1�Fools, all of you!You will answer for your sins...
1�More sacrificial lambs? And they give themselves willingly...Come unto me. I shall grant you swift release from your mortal suffering...
1�O beast of beasts... I pity what you have become.
1�The glorious Fenrir, whose mighty howl once shook the heavens, stands before me no more than a slavering mutt, too addled of mind to distinguish friend from foe.
1�Why? Why do you snap at the hand of your rightful master!?
y?�Filthy, repugnant child! You mock the will of the Almighty!?You will die like the rest!
1�Kah! Insolent fool
1�Kyaaahhhhhh!Enough! I will stand for no more of this blasphemy!
1�I pity you, my fallen brother beast.But my divine wrath will not be so merciful...
1�Look upon the face of your destruction, loathsome children of Altana!What strands of hope remain for your kind shall be rent as the flesh from your bones!
1�O, woeful children of Altana...
1�Strength you may have, but not wisdom.For even now you are blind to your own true nature...
1�Jealousy...spite...betrayal...Your souls are but festering pools of squalor.
1�So you are, and ever will be.What could you hope to attain?
1�O, how I shall rejoice from the heavens, as I gaze down upon your blind march to destruction...
1�Yes... Yes, I think so.Oh, thank you ever so much!
1�My companions are still imprisoned in the other cells!Please, you must save them too!
1�Could it be...Perih Vashai of the Anaconda Mercenaries!?
1�I...I can scarcely believe our fortune...We thought we were done forrr...
1�Thank you...so much...Our friends...are still in captivity in the other cells...Prrromise you won't leave them behind!
1�Oh, look! It's our knight in shining...leather?How can we ever repay you!?
1�Wh-why, I...<swoon>
1�Ah, y-yes, of course.Thank you so much!
1�There are still...others.On the upperrrmost floor...
1�And the child, Syu Befrathi...
1�They forced my companions to fight each other to the death. They threatened to...kill the child if we refused.It was...too t-terrible to watch. You must help them!
1�It looks somehow familiar...
1�...That's it! The monster who took our companions above...He was carrying one just like it!
1�You...!Tell me you're here...to rescue us!
1�Yes...somehow.
1�There was a loose bar...in my cell...<cough>...I slipped out unseen...during the changing of the guarrrd...
1�My companion, Koh...the others...they have not been so fortunate.P-please...you must help them!
